docs.abstract: The suave baritone was cast against type in Berg’s harrowing work at the Metropolitan Opera. But he is winning raves.
docs.snippet: The suave baritone was cast against type in Berg’s harrowing work at the Metropolitan Opera. But he is winning raves.
docs.lead_paragraph: It was a few days before the opening of Berg’s nightmarish “Wozzeck,” and a rehearsal had just ended on the stage of the Metropolitan Opera. As the crew began disassembling the set around him, Peter Mattei, the acclaimed baritone singing the title role for the first time, stayed onstage, negotiating his dying gesture with the director, the artist William Kentridge.

headline.main: Method to the Madness: Peter Mattei on Becoming Wozzeck

docs.abstract: The fugitive from Japan has put Lebanon in an awkward position.
docs.snippet: The fugitive from Japan has put Lebanon in an awkward position.
docs.lead_paragraph: BEIRUT, Lebanon — Five days after his triumphant homecoming to Beirut, Carlos Ghosn is all but invisible.

headline.main: Carlos Ghosn, at Home but Waiting for the Next Move
headline.print_headline: Lebanon Stuck In a Tricky Spot As Ghosn Waits

docs.abstract: Interest in the draft and “World War III” surged online, stalling the government website where young men are required to register. Here’s what you need to know.
docs.snippet: Interest in the draft and “World War III” surged online, stalling the government website where young men are required to register. Here’s what you need to know.
docs.lead_paragraph: For decades, American men over the age of 18 have gone through the ritual of registering with the government in case of a military draft. In recent years, this action has felt more like going through the motions, simply checking a box.

headline.main: Will There Be a Draft? Young People Worry After Military Strike

docs.abstract: Ride hailing apps, promising cheap and easy travel, cannibalized New York’s taxi industry. What happens when they no longer feel like a bargain?
docs.snippet: Ride hailing apps, promising cheap and easy travel, cannibalized New York’s taxi industry. What happens when they no longer feel like a bargain?
docs.lead_paragraph: It began as frantic holiday travel has since the dawn of time, with an argument about when to leave for the airport.

headline.main: Why Your Uber Ride Can Cost as Much as a Plane Ticket
headline.print_headline: Why an Uber Costs More Than Your Flight

docs.abstract: Ada Calhoun had a rough year. Fortunately, the process of writing her latest book prepared her for it.
docs.snippet: Ada Calhoun had a rough year. Fortunately, the process of writing her latest book prepared her for it.
docs.lead_paragraph: Two years ago, a cri de coeur of an essay addressing why middle-aged women were overwhelmed and exhausted went viral. Its author, Ada Calhoun, ended up writing an entire book on the subject: “Why We Can’t Sleep: Women’s New Midlife Crisis" (out this month).

headline.main: How a Voice of Female Gen X Anxiety Spends Her Sundays
headline.print_headline: A Rough Year, Eased by Her Own Writing

keywords.name: creative_works
keywords.value: Why We Can't Sleep: Women's New Midlife Crisis (Book)
